item.description:
Spend the weekend in beautiful downtown Bar Harbor Maine and Acadia National Park in late autumn, the prettiest time of the year on Mt. Desert Island. The multi-colored leaves will still be falling and the days will be crisp and clear to hike & bike in Acadia National Park or kayak along the splendid coastline of Mt. Desert or on one of the calm inland island lakes. Our accommodations for the weekend will be in luxurious rooms at the Bar Harbor Inn's Oceanfront Lodge located on the waterfront in the downtown area of Bar Harbor. The Oceanfront Lodge rooms are tastefully decorated in contemporary style and each have a private balcony overlooking the ocean. http://www.barharborinn.com/rooms_ofl.htm Bring your swimsuit as the Bar Harbor Inn has an outdoor heated pool & Hot Tub.

This Trip includes:

* 2 Nights lodging at Bar Harbor Inn
* Daily Continental Breakfast
* Friday evening beverages & appetizers Social

Price: $165 per person based on double occupancy rooms

* Optional Extra Nights only $150 per night or just $75 per person dbl. occ.

Please sign-up from the link below prior to RSVPing as an RSVP to this event will not be confirmed unless you register for this trip and make your $165 payment. If you have signed up for an Alfresco Adventures trip prior use the MemberId and Password you created or contact me if you forgot it. If you have not been on an Alfresco Adventures trip prior please click members to create one from web site link below.

http://alfrescoadventures.com/Trips/

Please click on the link above for More Info. or to sign-up for this trip

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at Bar Harbor Inn then proceed to Oceafron Lodge building
item.name: Bar Harbor & Acadia Bike, Hike, Kayak Oct. 26-28, 2012
